&#3944;&#3851;&#3928;: [3123] ... 1) lus skyed byed kyi ma/ ... drin can a ma/ ... a ma 'bod long med pa/ ... a ma ma gtogs mi mi shes/ thab ka ma gtogs sa mi shes/ ... 2) khyim 'dzin bud med rgan pa/ ... a ma rgad mo/ ... 3) (mngon) yungs kar gyi 'bras bu/ ...
*, mamma, mum, mummy, original of any document, mother, mother
1) mother [somewhat h]; 2) old woman who owns a house; 3) white mustard fruit; 4) main, principal
